record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, DECEMBER 11, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, DECEMBER 11, 2008 -- (Senate - December 10, 2008)

[Page: S10887]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand in recess until 10 a.m. tomorrow, Thursday, December 11; that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate proceed to a period of morning business for up to 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each; that following morning business, the Senate resume consideration of the motion to proceed to H.R. 7005.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
